statements: DELETE FROM inventory_reports WHERE id = 1 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM inventory_reports WHERE price > 1000 AND movement_speed = 'High';
DELETE FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND last_sold_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM promotion_targets WHERE target_type = 'Category' AND target_discount > 0.05;
DELETE FROM clearance WHERE product_id = 1001 AND clearance_price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM clearance_targets WHERE product_id = 202 AND target_date < '2022-01-01'
